line_1: They seem like puppets led about by wires.
line_2: The curious eye their awkward movement tires;

line_1: A mere tall puppet dancing on the wires.
line_2: Yourself, good Sir, are play'd by your desires,

line_1: And dizzy with delight, profan'd the sacred wires.
line_2: The victim of his own lascivious fires,

line_1: Notes more mellifluent floating o'er the wires,
line_2: Her HOEL'S breast the fair MIFANWY fires. —
